thread.title: State of emergency declared for snowstorms in western New York
thread.title_full: State of emergency declared for snowstorms in western New York

author: ABC News
title: State of emergency declared for snowstorms in western New York
text: State of emergency declared for snowstorms in western New York Gov. Kathy Hochul declared a state of emergency on Wednesday evening in anticipation of lake-effect snow impacting parts of the state in the coming days.
